website_summaries.verdict: A high quality headset stand and efficient charging hub all in one.
pros: The non-slip bottom has some weight to it, making the stand almost impossible to knock over
The stand is slim and doesn't take up too much space
The addition of an on-off switch was appreciated for power-saving purposes
LED indicator shows when the stand is powered on
5 additional charging ports— 3 USB and 2 AC
cons: Stand only available in black and orange color pattern

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to create a small charge station on my dresser for all my i-things and sound devices. I stumbled onto the Cozoo headphone stand and thought I’d give it a try. The design is simple; it has 3 USB ports and 2 power strip outlets. There is a large press button in the corner and a small light under the middle USB port that indicates off / on. I didn’t think I’d use the 2 power outlets but I’ve found myself connecting things there because it’s convenient. The entire unit is pretty solid and won’t tip over. Overall I’m happy I found this. It works and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this stand. Its build tuff and don't fall over like the cheap stands. Has 3 USB ports that charge pretty quick. The stand has a power button to turn off the charging device so your not burning power and it hasn't overheated with all ports charging. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: BIGKev

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Although I do like the functionality of the product, its absolutely IMPOSSIBLE to assemble without breaking the plastic tabs! The metal stand opening where the tabs insert are WAY TOO SMALL! I've put so much pressure on it to push it into place and it's still not going in. Any more pressure will most definitely break the plastic tabs... This makes it useless as a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it for ps4 users its great for charging your ...
customer_reviews.text: Im loving this headset stand! I highly recommend it for ps4 users its great for charging your headset and controler freeing up those usb ports for other things. It feels sturdy, has non slip grips on the bottom and has an led indicator for when its on. The headset hanging on it is 2 inches wide and it safely holds it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor T.

customer_reviews.title: Decent once you figure out how to assemble it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice enough product, heck it is better than nice for its price. The problem is that the package includes no instructions whatsoever. Zero, nada, nothing. In order to get it assembled you have to disassemble it further so that wires fit properly (especially if you're using it to charge an apple watch). The thing is that without instruction, you're literally guessing and hoping that parts your pull apart don't break and actually go back together. To the seller, include some instructions and your ratings would be higher. Once you figure it out and provide your own wires (again, seller, consider including some cables), the product works pretty nicely.
customer_reviews.author: xuanandgabriel

customer_reviews.title: Weird pulsing noise, crappy charger, overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It's a good stand. But that's where it stops. I can't charge my Steelseries headset and use them at the same time because there's a weird beeping/pulsing noise that runs through the headset as it charges through any of the 3 provided ports (does not happen when plugged directly into the pc or through my hub). Doesn't charge my phone very well, seems to send pulses of charge through when it's low on battery making it trigger the low battery notification over and over and over. I wish I would have saved my box so I could return this thing. It is really just an overpriced stand, but a solid stand so I gave it a 2.
customer_reviews.author: David Vanbogelen

customer_reviews.title: Great stand and charge for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a bit over a month now as the primary charger for a phone, wireless mouse, smart watch, and the wireless headset that sits on it. No issues so far, all the ports work and the stand is sturdy enough. Also using the outlets for a lamp and laptop charger. The best part is they didn't add RGB to mark the price up. I do wish the USB ports were always on and the switch controlled the outlets. But that's mainly because I have it sitting on an end table in the living room and would have liked to use it as an on/off switch for the lamp without affecting USB charging. Subjective(and admittedly nitpicky) con.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: It's made so cheap I can see it being in the trash in the next year
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this product does as advertised. But the plastic construction and weight of it is so low quality it left me feeling very disappointed. If I had to purchase it again, I wouldn't. Also, there are no instructions in the box and it was confusing trying to pull one part that looked like it should come apart, but was jammed so hard together I thought I was going to break it.
customer_reviews.author: TommyBoyChicago

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this Earphone Holder & The Ports for Charging Devices
customer_reviews.text: I like to wear headphones and sometimes in-ear phones when listening to music or meditation programs when I go to bed. I get relaxed and kind of threw them onto my nightstand which meant they'd land on my phone or obstruct the alarm clock. Also, a pain to keep them charged. This stand allows me to keep the short charging ports plugged in so it's easy to keep things organized and at my fingertips. I can also plug my phone into it. No more cords coming up from the floor! Whomever designed this was really thinking! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate pictures and description
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered 2 of these because I thought the first one was defective but I’ve come to the conclusion that the product description and pictures are inaccurate. The product does not come apart so you can put your Apple Watch charger inside and hide the chord. The only way to use the Apple Watch charger with this stand would be to wrap the chord around the neck of the stand. Pictures etc need to be updated so people know what they’re buying.
customer_reviews.author: Madilyn Mangas

customer_reviews.title: His Side of The Bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a gift to my husband particularly because he uses his expensive headphones a lot and had no proper way to store them and charge them at the same time. This product works great, it’s study for the side of the bed. It doesn’t topple over easily, and it slows him to charge his phone, watch, headphones, and IPad. It has 3 USD ports as well as a plug outlet. More unimportantly it blends well with my bedroom decor and keeps his side of the bed neat and orderly.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great stand, dangerous charger
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying the stand is great, it's easy to assemble and it looks modern and sleek. The charging ports however, don't always work. They cut in and out of power and sometime smell like they are burning. When I noticed this I became very cautious and unplugged it. Based on other reviews I have seen, I'm sure I just so happened to receive a defective stand. Therefore, I look forward to sending it back for a new one. Keeping in mind to pay close attention when plugging it in.
customer_reviews.author: dakota

customer_reviews.title: The headphone stand fits great, and all of the outlets work flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute lifesaver. The headphone stand fits great, and all of the outlets work flawlessly. The stand is very sturdy and the whole unit came incredibly well-packaged. This helps significantly with tidying up my desk. I actually didn’t mean to order two but I’m glad I did because my husband fell in love with it after I had it set up. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Mysti Shirley

customer_reviews.title: The boyfriend is happy!
customer_reviews.text: He is a man of little wants. His Christmas list was very short with this being one of the things he requested. I am obsessed with organization so I was definitely on board with him having a place to charge his wireless headphones along with his cell phone, and game console batteries. We have had this for a little over six months now and have had zero issues. I recommend it whether you’re looking for your boyfriend, husband or for yourself! The saying goes “happy husband happy life”, right?
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: When will it rip my head phones?
customer_reviews.text: The stand feels light and cheap. The pole that holds the head phones has shape edges that should of been rounded off, taking my headphones off feels like some day I'm going to ripe the fabric. (Not a matter of if but when) the plug works really good. Love the shut off switch so I can turn the whole thing off when not in use. The plugs feel tight, the USB ports also feel secure.
customer_reviews.author: DWIGHT H.

customer_reviews.title: Works too well, now the wife wants one!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! I use it on my Sony WH-1000XM3 set and also on my V-Moda Crossfade M-100 set, works really well for both. My office chair also has a usb massager so it's really nice to use its built in hub for that! Looks great on my desk and gives my headphones a proper home for charging and quickly answering of daily phone calls. Love this!! Now the wife wants one!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July already doesn’t work. Hasn’t had any incidents just stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Ann Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and looks good, too.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, sturdy and works as it should. The only negative (and it is minor) is that the USB ports are EXTREMELY tight; it takes significant effort to plug a cable into them. But I'd rather they were tight than loose and allowing the cables to fall out. I've had that situation with other charging docks and it's no bueno. Again, that one negative is easily overlook-able. All in all, a solid B+.
customer_reviews.author: fotii

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stand Looks good Holds headphones well Charges all of my devices Build quality is fine; not great, but certainly not bad Assembly is really easy Unfortunately, there is no where to store the cable, so I recommend using it primarily for wireless. However, I use my wired headphones for it and it works fine
customer_reviews.author: King Mongkut

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing and functional
customer_reviews.text: its efficient for holding my head set, it comes with 2 outlets and the ones that are grounded in case that matters to you. it has 4 USB charging ports and they like the 2 outlets are powered when you press the circular button, very satisfying to click on. my headset is wired so I do have to drape it over the part holding my headset. the bar is wide enough to let me do that and not have an excess barley holding onto the bar because there is so much space. I Imagine the same is true if you have a slightly bigger headset.
customer_reviews.author: Sindy

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with stand
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what they describe and I have no complaints about quality or anything else. I do have some advice if you are looking for an item like this though: get the one with the orange highlights. I didn't, and now I think it would be nice to have that visual. Also, consider one that leans forward, so that the post doesn't come hit the headphones. Just a few preferences I figured out after buying this. No problems with it at all though. It does the job and the USB ports are handy.
customer_reviews.author: tay

customer_reviews.title: Headphone stand
customer_reviews.text: I love that there is 3 usb outputs to charge what you need and two outlets to charge your computer or add an extra charger to add even more for charging phones or tablets. The head peice is plastic and the bar is metal. The base is perfect because it’s sturdy for my headphones as you see in the pictures I took. I just need to get shorter charging cables for my headphone any suggestions? All in all I just got 10/22/2018 if I update for anyreason I will tell what I think about it then. But for now it’s great to have 😁✌🏻👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Nino Bottalico

customer_reviews.title: You May Want To Purchase A Different Brand...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a little over a year and a half ago from writing this review. It’s worked great for all that time, but now for some reason the unit turns on and off by itself every two or three seconds. So it is not reliable anymore for charging anything. I’m not sure if mine was defective or not. I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Arthur A. Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. I'm always skeptical with affordable prices and small brands but I am so glad I bought this. Will be buying more for all our computer set ups. The charger charges pretty quickly I charge my iphone on here more than anywhere else. So impressed at the charge speed. Its not bulky and it doesn't require a lot of space. It comes as one unit no assembly required. Do yourselves a favor, give it a chance. Brand isn't always everything.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyRose

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality
customer_reviews.text: The headphone rest was manufactured with sharp edges that will eventually cut the fabric on the headphones. I covered the sharp edges with black electric tape. Also was unable to locate the on/ off switch. Ports appear to work satisfactorily. Worth about $20 on a good day ,not $32.
customer_reviews.author: Green Lantern

customer_reviews.title: Have two, USB on the first one died in a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought two (one for home, one for office.) I still have the dead one because (a) It isn't worth the trouble of returning and (b) I still need a place to hang headphones, even if the USB charger doesn't function. Fortunately the AC outputs still work. It's clearly built down to a price. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I like the ease of having all electronics in one place.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home office and it works wonderfully for that. I have to have fast and easy access to my headset for work but hate wearing one for hours, easy to see it hanging there and is not blocking a screen this way. Keeps both my phone and tablet charged also.
customer_reviews.author: Rshiel

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Looks good. Has handy power outlets and USB charging ports on board.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Looks good. Has handy power outlets and USB charging ports on board. Some people have said that it won't hold two pair of headphones, but it easily does for me. I hang a big pair of rechargeable over-the-ear headphones on the front bracket arm and a wired phone headset on the back bracket arm. It holds them both easily. I think it looks good and works well. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good, but needs a sturdier/heavier base.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but it needs a heavier base. Once the headphones are hanging, it becomes a little precariously top-heavy. I've resorted to using 3m tape underneath it to attach it to the nightstand because it kept tipping/falling over with just the slightest touch otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Tye

customer_reviews.title: Great options for the price
customer_reviews.text: This set was sorely underated - it's great for the price as it has so many options available with both the (3) USB and (2) plugs, the only thing is it's a little hard to notice the ON light in the front of the design but for the price - it does so much. Really happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany_808

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I mean not much to say. It is a good quality product that functions as advertised. I got the one with additional plugins and USB ports. Everything works. There is an on-off switch for the plugs and I'm not sure why it is there but it does exist and work. I haven't had any use for it yet but maybe someone else does.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control or Poor Design Engineering?!?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Vertical extruded aluminum tube would not slip fully down over intended friction fit boss on base or on top for holding headset. I bought two of these and both were this way. Even with providing some lubrication on the lower boss the picture shows the most I could slide it on and that was with around 1/16 - 1/8" of visible flexure of the area around the base of the boss to the area with the 110V plug outlets. I did not dare try any harder without fear of breaking a Christmas present for my kids. 110V and USB ports are functional as expected, but too much variance in design tolerance to allow for proper assembly.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Hulka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any gamers with headsets! Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is just for my gaming needs! My husband and I both have wireless turtle each gaming headsets, and we use one base for both pairs to charge on. They both fit, nicely, and I love that there are extra USB ports and outlets on the base if you want to charge other items. This product has helped us keep our expensive headsets in wonderful condition!
customer_reviews.author: Isabella P.

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Extremely convenient - Wonderful for wireless headsets, even ones with short charging cables because you can keep it right on your desk and it takes up very little space - Keeps my phone charged without having to plug it into a port across the room Cons: - It has a power button on it that doesn't actually work and didn't out of the box - The stand/pole doesn't slot completely onto the bottom of the stand (more an aesthetic annoyance because it's still 90% slotted and totally sturdy)
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Andrews

customer_reviews.title: USB ports no longer work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these headphone stands, one for my desk, and one near the TV. Two of the USB ports on the front of the unit stopped working. I can plug in a standard AC USB plug onto the face of the unit and charge my phone or headphones, but only one of the three USB ports on the front of the unit works. The same for the second unit we purchased, the AC plug works, but not the USB ports. Not sure if I could recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a gamer!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He seemed to love that it didn't take up much space on his desk. It is very multifunctional since you can charge varies items and have a stand for your headset. My husband is a big gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Stand with Charger!
customer_reviews.text: The fact that I have a stand and charger all in one is perfect. So far, so good. A great looking addition to my desk set up. Everything has charged super fast and it takes up very little space. After looking at many other reviews on other similar stands I'm beyond glad that I decided on this one. I plan on buying another one for my work office!
customer_reviews.author: Bran Solo

customer_reviews.title: HAZARDOUS
customer_reviews.text: This product almost caught my house on 🔥 FIRE!!! I had plugged in my Apple Watch and my phone to charge and next thing I know loud popping noises started coming from my desk. I turn around and see glowing lights inside my stand and a burning smell. Unplugging it immediately and not use it as a stand only. A COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY AND A HEALTH HAZARD!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very practical stand.
customer_reviews.text: Very practical. Those power plus and USB charging ports are super handy, helping to declutter my desk. The support is nice enough. Only wish they had an aluminum version.
customer_reviews.author: SDuford

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP!
customer_reviews.text: Power plug doesn't really fit into the back of the stand. Also things that are plugged in never charge. The thing is made of plastic and isn't the most soundly built. For this price I was expecting way more. I would look into other options!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is intended to do. Very sleek looking. Sure it doesn't have RGB lighting but it's also a lot cheaper without sacrificing build quality. The USB power button feels like it will withstand a 1000 years. I also like that it has a 110v power cord rather than a USB. Overall, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dre H.

customer_reviews.title: broke after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a few months of on and off head set use,, and no i dont throw them on and off, i gently take them on and off, till one time I went to set them down and the stand snapped... Was happy using it till that happened.
customer_reviews.author: Knightfire5513

customer_reviews.title: The only thing missing from my desk
customer_reviews.text: I love how this can plug in my headphones, iPhone and any other USB device. It also has an outlet on top for those of us who have the newer iPhone that does not have USB charging.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Seems and feels sturdy, holds B&W PX perfectly well
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to hold a Bowers and Wilkins PX. It does the job perfectly. Ports USB do chatge the headphones and additional galaxy note 8 with no problem. I havent tried the 110v outlets yet. I like it and recommend it. UPDATE 07-02-2018 The 110v outlets work great for my note8 rapid charge brick
customer_reviews.author: Fierce_Brake

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of just laying my headphones on the desk, and decided to give this stand a try. Glad I did. The addition of the three USB ports are the perfect accessory. I am using one to recharge the headphones, and another to recharge my phone, nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multi-use
customer_reviews.text: I am quite happy with this stand. It has two AC power sockets and 3 USB ports on the front for charging. Quite sturdy, can hold a heavy pair of big headphones if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Vivas

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: There is this button on the front that controls the flow of power to the USB ports. My headphone stand came with a defective button. The only way to get power to the USB ports is to manually hold this button down. This makes the USB charging ports useless as I have to physically hold down this button to charge anything. Crappy design that lead to an immediate failure in functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, Very nifty
customer_reviews.text: I actually put 2 headsets on this and it holds both and they dont fall. Charging (phones and stuff) with the usb ports is the same as plugging it into the wall. But its more convenient to plug it into them.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: The BEST purchase for your gaming setup
customer_reviews.text: This headphone stand exceeded ALL of my expectations. I didn’t even realize separate from the USB power supply, there are regular power outlets on the top of it as well. The black look is most definitely sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Braiden Aneshansley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Allot of money for a cheap product. Would spend more money to send it back!
customer_reviews.author: bnvrstll

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I paired it with a couple of magnetic charging cables to charge my kids headphones and controller for the PS4. It works great and is super convenient. 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: C. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best headphone stand!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible headphone stand. I have Bowers & Wilkins headphones that are rechargeable, and this stand is perfect with three USB ports that you can use for various devices, plus two power outlets for you to connect any other devices. Hands down, the best stand with no cons.
customer_reviews.author: Kyusho Jitsu Master

customer_reviews.title: Super Useful
customer_reviews.text: So I'm a Digital Media Specialist, and I'm constantly charging tech in my workplace, so to have this on desk is like a really nice LUXURY! I can charge my wireless headphone, my phone, my power bank and have 2 interns using the outlet all at the same time !!!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: easy setup, convenient features for $35
customer_reviews.text: The item is currently listed for $35 and I would recommend it for the current price. I purchased it at $45 and was on the fence regarding the value of the purchase. I had another headphone stand that worked well, but when I saw this, I knew I could make great use of the power and usb charging ports. Definitely a convenient product and seems well made. The power switch is also a convenient addon as well.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Headphone charger
customer_reviews.text: I usually dont do reviews but I really like this product. I like the way I can use it with my headphones and charge them and other items. Also the on and off button is convenient
customer_reviews.author: THE MAJOR

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my Gaming room
customer_reviews.text: Just got this Cozoo headphone stand with USB plugs. Came it ins own very nice custom box packaged right in pre cut foam. Only work was taking it out inserting the middle metal bracket into the stand and then the head phone holder on top fits nice and tight so won’t fall apart. Comes with a heavy duty cord with a three prong plug.
customer_reviews.author: SM113

customer_reviews.title: Husband Love It. I love it more.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for husband, and I have no self control so I gave it to him already. He loves it. I love that Im not picking up his controllers and headphones all the time. Or that I’m not hearing him complain about how he forgot to charge them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Langhorne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and does everything I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.text: One of my better purchases. I am very happy, it assembled easily and the charging ports are nice and the three-prong outlets on there are great for charging more items as well. The indicator light for if it’s on or not should really be on top of the middle USB port but it is the most minor nitpicky thing because you can tell if it’s on or not by the button. Also I’m too lazy to take a picture but it looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany's profile

customer_reviews.title: Seller does not back product. Mine never worked
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived DOA. Automated seller email comes and I tell them they don't charge and have no power. The seller response was not our problem amazon ships these.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good stand
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't feel very stable and quality seems mostly good. It does it's job and the usb + extra outlets are VERY useful.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of the charging. Have Boss Waza Airs headphones and can charge on dock. Pad the holder and post because they will dent earpads ut other than that great product
customer_reviews.author: Scott E

customer_reviews.title: great headphone stand
customer_reviews.text: great headphone stand, several people have asked me about it and I would highly recommend it. cant beat the price for the features. I have had several others that were more expensive and might have looked a bit better but this is the most functional headphone stand I have owned. My only complaint is I don't like the bright orange top - I wish it was all black.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua (Grover) Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a week, so can't give a long-term assessment. Nice, heavy base. Power, both USB and 120v, work well. So far seems to be good quality connections. Power switch has a nice feel to it. Stand has a wide cross section and does not appear to be causing any issues with padded portion of headphones. Overall, a very nice stand. Does what I need, and does it well. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great stand! Good quality! Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: This headphone stand is the quality and the look that completes my PC setup. I even like the positive "click" of the power button when I turn it on, and the understated light on the front that's shows that power is on. Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: WVMike

customer_reviews.title: This stand's power options are a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I've been using this handy stand now for a few weeks. It charges up my Bose Q35s and now I'm also using it to power my long range blue tooth transmitterso that I can walk all over my house with my Q35s without any sound loss. This stand is great. the 3 USB inputs are very handy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bruso

customer_reviews.title: Great features and nice stand!
customer_reviews.text: Love the USB outputs on this, and the AC plugs too. I actually plugged an Anker 4-port USB plug charger into the AC plug, so I have a total of 7 USB plugs on my stand now all being utilized. (none of the USB devices draw much power at once). I like that this stand creates a central charging hub for my wireless headset and other devices.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Jackson

customer_reviews.title: No assembly needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution to store headphones when not in use. Two 110v outlets and 3 usb charging ports very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, but eventually after 18 months died out and stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: I had tried a few similar products and eventually stuck with this one because it worked so well. the charging ports are so useful and it held my headset great also. It doesn't take up much space either. Unfortunately, while charging a few things at once, it died and the charging ports no longer provide any charge (AC or USB). I liked it so much I might end up buying it again, but just a caution against using all the ports at once. This could ruin it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold headphones very well
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty much just using this for the usb charging function. the base is great but the top really doesn't hold the headphones well so they keep falling off. The material is all plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Khaleesi, Mother of Dragons

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset. Works as I expected, in fact perhaps even better. The stand is functional with electrical outlets that are a great addition. Fast shipping, highly recommend this product and the stand is definitely worth getting
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Hart

customer_reviews.title: A game-changer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for both a controller charger and a place to store and charge my gaming headset and this does both excellently. Everything works as expected, I use it nearly every day, and it’s compact, sleek, and feels like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Suchy

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to organize charging all your things!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know I needed it until I got it! Use it bedside to hold my night time wireless ear phones, and charge everything from my phone to my e-reader to my essential oil diffuser! Keeps it all neat and organized
customer_reviews.author: S. Motley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product would Recomend. Sound and function,style are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these six mouths ago I think there the greatest. I use these because my hearing is bad and I normally have TV to loud for others I can wear these and it does not bother other people in the house. Avantree support people helped me with a issue that after 5 or 6 hors sound would stop and I would have to plug them in again to restore the sound. Avantree support is the greatest fast responce
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to finally have a place for my kids to put their headset. This device is a wonderful central charging station for 3 USB devices. It also has 2 "regular" power ports on it for other equipment (which I didn't realize when I ordered). I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McCathran

customer_reviews.title: Headphone stand
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter in college. She has already used it and she reports that it has great quality; function even for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Apple Charger wont fit
customer_reviews.text: Its all plastic but thats not a bad thing. The main issue with this is that the part where the apple watch goes, the chord doesnt fit because there is a piece you cannot take off. Its stuck or glued on which defeats the whole purpose of having it charge your apple watch. Unless there is a fix for this I would not recommend this product if you are looking to charge your apple watch.
customer_reviews.author: Long H

customer_reviews.title: Lots of ports, intuitive design
customer_reviews.text: This is an intuitive easy to assemble design that does a good job with cable management and maintains a clean appearance. Lots of USB ports. I wish it was a bit heavier because it has tipped over with my bigger headphones on it (AKG N700NC M2) and I know there are even bigger headphones that may be a bit heavy for this holder.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for!!! Was able to plug in everything I needed to with extra slots as well. Headset sits nice and looks good!!! Plus it isnt super tall so it sits nice underneath my TV!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Q

customer_reviews.title: Charging station is great but not headphone wise
customer_reviews.text: I wish I got something more stable but I do love how many USB ports there are but for headphones it works but I could find better
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Boss

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it is strong judging by what it feels like it's made of
customer_reviews.text: It feels like the plugs are a little loose, but it is a thousand times better than the one I purchased this one to replace. Time can only tell on other information for me to give.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan L.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Headset holder ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Headset holder. It has everything I needed t keep my Headset charged and my desktop clean.
customer_reviews.author: David K. van Hoose

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient to have the usb ports and additional outlets. Holds both of my headsets on the stand. Absolutely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Customer1234

customer_reviews.title: Charging doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The charging abilities if this device doesn’t work at all. I’ve used different plugs, cords, etc.. nothing actually charges when it’s plugged in. Total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has USB ports ready to go. They have an on/off switch. Lighting to show when they are charging. Holding up my Turtle Bay headphones every day. Great product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Birdman

customer_reviews.title: I've been very pleased with this headphone stand and recharging station
customer_reviews.text: I've been very pleased with this headphone stand and recharging station. It works well in my office to hold my Bluetooth headphones and recharge them. I also like the additional 3-prong outlets for charging my phone which supports the USB-C type connection. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was super quick. Take out of box and plug in. Ready to go! Works great for my husband’s wireless headset!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Poli

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone stand
customer_reviews.text: GREAT!!! headphone stand. It's super convenient and has multiple USB and a regular electrical connections. Its a must have if you have multiple electrinics that need consistent charge.
customer_reviews.author: nmateo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas, and it has worked well. He loves it, and it helps with charging his headset and cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY LAMBDIN

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I wish the top of the stand was a little larger to accommodate two sets of headphones a bit easier. Since this is designed for one I can't complain. Nice looking, good quality, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Entropy

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Easy access to outlets to charge my photography equipment. Nice and sturdy and holds my headphones well!
customer_reviews.author: kevjitzoo

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bougt it sooner. Incredically useful.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how I lived without the stand. Fits perfectly on my desk, have my lamp plugged in and hang my wireless headphone for nightly charging along with my cell phone and tablet connected to the USB ports. Even recommended the COZOO desktop lamp with the 3 usb ports for his office desk.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Hull

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I needed it to. I didn't want a USB plug for the power so this AC plug was very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cheaply made. Bought as a Xmas present, and with a day had to return it. Not even funny how cheap it felt.
customer_reviews.author: Dan ReidTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and looks nice and organized at my desk. The USB ports and power button are a bit tight and don’t have the best finish, but overall it does the trick. I’m happy with it. Definitely worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Morales Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome
customer_reviews.text: This stand is awesome. I have it at my work desk and I always have like 4 things plugged into it and it is no problem. I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson seifert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a gamer
customer_reviews.text: Got both my boys one for christmas and they love them. Somewhere to put their headsets and charge all their other toys!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Aiuppy

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Son likes it. Seems useful for him as he’s a tech type of person
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. I regret waiting as long as I did.
customer_reviews.author: 56phl

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his stand. He puts his Xbox headset to rest & when he needs to charge his cell phone he uses the usb connected to charge as well.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Does What It's Supposed To, But Feels Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This stand does what it advertises, but I can't help but feel a little disappointed by the quality of the materials used. It's hard to explain, but the materials don't feel as quality as they look. That being said, the stand looks really nice from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Ransom

product_meta.title: Headphone Stand with USB Charger COZOO Desktop Gaming Headset Holder Hanger with 3 USB Charger and 2 Outlets - Suitable for Gaming, DJ, Wireless Earphone Display (Orange)
feature_bullets: 【All in one design】Universal headphone stand + 3 USB charging ports(4A/20W) + 2 outlets Power Strip(1250W rated power) Great gift for Grandson,Son,Boy,Man,Husband and Boyfriend.

【3 Port Smart USB Charger】 It can detects your device automatically to deliver its fastest possible charge speed up to 2.4 amps per port or 4 amps overall,more convenient to charge your smartphone, ipad, tablet or other smart device without plug in wall.

【Safe Features】Fire-resistant and hardened plastic outer shell for durability, no risk of wood flammable and metal leakage,build-in premium circuitry and microchip, ensure device safety.Multi-protection system shields everything from overload, short-circuits, over-current and other charging issues.

【What You Get】COZOO Headphone dock / Power Strip / 3-Port USB Charger, 5ft / 1.5m Integrated Power Cord , 24-Month COZOO warranty & 90-DAY money back guarantee.If there is any quality issue for this headphone rack or you are not happy with your purchase, please do not hesitate to contact us.
